website_summaries.verdict: The best value if you’re looking for a top-notch, heavy-duty sink. Just be aware that it is a little on the large size.
pros: A heavy (and heavy-duty) sink that gets high praise for its stability once installed
cons: May be too large for some
Sink hole is actually 1 ¾”, not the standard 1 ½” US size

customer_reviews.title: Water spots are a nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Looked awesome, drained well but you must dry after each use otherwise the water spots are horrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Huge
customer_reviews.text: pretty solid and sturdy sink. Very heavy so be careful taking it out of the box! I bought this for my powder room remodel and unfortunately even with measuring this sink is HUGE and won't work! May use it in my downstairs bathroom so I'll keep it. Definitely worth the money! Price is unmatched and came intact. Packed very well.
customer_reviews.author: QTKP

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT, PERFECT, PERFECT !!!
customer_reviews.text: The photo’s speak for themselves!! I ordered two sinks, they arrived very quickly & were packaged with much care. For the price I paid I never imagined they would be such exellent quality. They are large & are made with very thick glass. There is a slight green tint to them which I love because not only is it pretty, it matches my shower doors. If you’re looking for this type of sink, you will not be disappointed. I wanted something different then the average sink & I am so please I chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same sink that is sold in our local big box store for $99.00. It is very heavy duty and we'll made. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, heavy sink that contains the water with no splash out.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and heavy glass vessel sink. This bowl is the perfect size. It contains the water even at 'full blast' with a kid washing their hands, with no splash out. Large enough to be comfortable washing your hands, face, etc. but not so big it takes over the counter. Fast shipping, well packaged, I ended up buying 2 and have one in my Master bathroom and in my 1/2 bath. Highly recommend this sink!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these beautiful vessels in the remodeling process for our master bath. Hey shipping was fast and they arrived in perfect condition. They are very heavy and beautifully shaped and quite large. I love everything about them there is absolutely nothing to dislike. I am happy that they have a glass of green tinge to them, which is what we need, since our bathroom will be mostly white and beige. I will post again when our project is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Kahni H.

customer_reviews.title: Its just pretty to look at!
customer_reviews.text: It was love at first sight! I am so smitten with this glass vessel sink, I am having a hard time finding the right Vanity & countertop to place it on. I have purchased the right faucet to accent it well, but I just can't make a firm decision on the perfect vanity cabinet. When I find it and purchase it, I will tear my powder room apart and get every thing installed right away. I have all ready purchased the new lighting and wall tiles. I backed off 1 "easy installation star" because the disk that supports/braces this sink to the counter had to be purchased separately. But that's the only flaw. I just love this sink. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Philly_PA

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now.
customer_reviews.text: This sink is exactly what I wanted. Large enough bowl width and depth to keep from splashing over the edge, and clear to see the beautiful granite it rests upon. It does have a slight green hue but which I think is just the density of the glass. I'm so....... happy.
customer_reviews.author: E webb

customer_reviews.title: ... product foe less than 1/2 of the coast very pleased with shipping
customer_reviews.text: looked at this item as my house is under construction due to hurricane Harvey similar item old at lows at $100 is see no difference in quality of product foe less than 1/2 of the coast very pleased with shipping
customer_reviews.author: kayla shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Where’s my merchandise!
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 2 sinks and only received 1. I emailed the seller days ago, no response. I’m in the middle of remodeling and need the other. The sink is lovely, very heavy and appears to be durable. Afraid to install because I need both! So, the jury is still out on the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Angel heaven

customer_reviews.title: Love this vessel sink - great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful vessel sink. The only drawback is because it is clear, you tend to see spots quite easily. I wipe it out often, to keep it pristine. I paired this with a black sink topper and the duo are stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kleinfelter

customer_reviews.title: Good for the DIYer
customer_reviews.text: Much more consumer friendly in price, rather than Lowe's or Home Depot...and I like both stores. Definitely a good product, not too heavy, but not light enough to seem chincy. I say yay to this product.
customer_reviews.author: SendInDaNinja

customer_reviews.title: Clear Tempered Vessel Sink (Half the price of H/Depot or Lowes!!)
customer_reviews.text: It's incredible when you can find something on Amazon.com at HALF the price of Home Depot or Lowes. Identical product I SWEAR to the major store's brand; literally. Weight, color, clarity, there is NO reason no to buy this nor not recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sink worked perfect for us. As other customers noted it does have a green tinge to it, but not unattractive. The packaging was sufficient and we love that this sink is clear so we can admire our vanity through the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality couldn't be better....and incredibly easy to install. They look amazing on the new marble countertop!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy & think glass
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute unexpected purchase for our guest bath. It is definitely a great sink for the price!! It was larger than I expected & you have to wipe it out each time you use it to prevent water spots, but it’s a great statement piece for a bathroom. We get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful simple sink
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful sink. As mentioned in other reviews, it IS clear, but the glass definitely has a (pretty) green tinge to it, especially at the brim. I installed it with the KINGO HOME Contemporary Single Handle Brushed Nickel Tall Vessel Sink Bathroom Faucet ,Basin Mixer Tap and it looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: 4Apples

customer_reviews.title: It still looks nice and will look less green once installed
customer_reviews.text: A few of the customer questions asked about green tint in the glass with responses saying just the rim was green, and I was surprised at how green the bowl actually looks. It still looks nice and will look less green once installed, but for the price it's an awesome sink.
customer_reviews.author: Bke13

customer_reviews.title: Well-balanced, good quality glass vessels for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of sinks, and these are my favorite glass sinks. They’re well-balanced, high quality, and just the right size. The rounded lip resists chipping, unlike flat-topped glass vessels, and thus far I have only had one sink with a flaw in the glass, and that one was small and unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: SimsekStrikes

customer_reviews.title: Tough to beat!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these for my condo. Arrived quickly and I was not disappointed. They look beautiful and love that I can see my granite countertops beneath them. Great price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey's mom

customer_reviews.title: make a perfect combination with the black star galaxy granite vanity top
customer_reviews.text: These sinks, along with 2 Senlesen waterfall, brush nickel single handle faucets, and the 2 Inello brush nickel pop-up drains, make a perfect combination with the black star galaxy granite vanity top.
customer_reviews.author: Airbornechief

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vessel sink at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The glass vessel sink fits perfectly in my remodeled bathroom. It was reasonably priced. Shipped fast!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sinks!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We bought 2 to put in our master bath re-do and they look great! Great value too, the same vessels in the big box stores were 3 times as much! Delivery was as promised (very timely) and packaging was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price!!! Couldn't find the right one at Home Depot or lowes that fit the thickness of our granite counter top with the drain pipe. Lowes had only one sink that had an over flow drain hole. With the over flow the thickness of the bowl and counter couldn't get the drain tubes to connect even with an extender..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is stunning! It arrived in perfect condition. For those asking, yes it has a green tint but I love that, it makes it feel more spa-like. We finally installed it today and LOVE it. Outstanding quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This type of vessel sink can explode spontaneously, no warning!
customer_reviews.text: This sink was great until the day it exploded as though a bomb went off in my room. It was spontaneous and very scary, I was standing directly in front of it. After looking it up on google, this seems to be a problem with tempered glass vessel sinks.
customer_reviews.author: tina elkins

customer_reviews.title: These sinks have got to be the best buy of our bathroom remodel
customer_reviews.text: These sinks have got to be the best buy of our bathroom remodel. The price is ridiculously low compared to local plumbing stores and they are heavy duty and my wife loves the look.
customer_reviews.author: mobile

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the look
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting it to be as big as it is. I did not read the measurements before buying. It’s very thick and heavy. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!  Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We did a remodel by using our same vanity...repainting...adding discarded tile from another project...this gorgeous sink bargain...and a new waterfall faucet! The border sets it off!

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this vessel sink. Was exactly what we were looking for in our bathroom remodel

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in great condition.

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from builder standard white porcelin flush mounts
customer_reviews.text: These are thick and seem sturdy, you would be hard pressed to break one of these. The opening is for a 1 3/4" drain , so don't buy the wrong size standard 1 1/2" US like at Home Depot and Lowes, plan ahead! I was worried that the fluoride in toothpaste would etch the glass over time, like hydrofluoric acid does, but this does not seem to be the case after using for a whole month now.

Just print out a shipping label and FedEx picks it up for you free of charge) and reordered the same sink. Received it in a timely manner and this one is just what I was expecting! Very well made, thick glass and you can't beat the price.

customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with my purchase of two vessel glass sinks for the double master bath. I was hesitant because the cost was so low but read the other reviews and decided to order. For the price I'm still in shock of the great quality. The product arrived in two days completely un damaged. I laugh when I go to the big box store around the corner at more than $100 !!! I was able to buy two sinks and a faucet for the price of one sink at the Big box guy...

product_meta.title: Miligore Modern Glass Vessel Sink - Above Counter Bathroom Vanity Basin Bowl - Round Clear
product_meta.description:
Instantly add contemporary style and upscale elegance to any bathroom or bar with the Miligore clear tempered glass round bowl sink.

Crafted of superior quality, impact-resistant materials, this beautiful showpiece not only offers exquisite design but durable functionality as well. Featuring a stain and scratch-resistant surface, this 1/2" thick, clear bowl will retain its original brilliance even after years of use, effectively repelling discoloration and unsightly markings.

Installation is simple, as bowl is pre-drilled with a perfectly-centered, beveled drain hole and easily accommodates the use of any standard, non-overflow type drain.

Drain opening is standard sized (1-3/4' diameter). Bowl Size: 16 -1/2" (diameter) x 5-1/2" (high), Bowl Thickness: 1/2".

Drains and mounting rings sold separately.

Miligore is the premier source for professional-grade fixtures that combine stylish design with exceptional durability.
feature_bullets: OUTSTANDING VALUE: This premium glass bowl sink offers exceptional value compared to nearly identical models available in custom home designer showrooms and even home improvement superstores.

SLEEK ELEGANT DESIGN: Add high-style to any bathroom or bar vanity with this sleek and contemporary tempered glass sink bowl, which offers modern, minimalist elegance and glamour to instantly update any room.

UNSURPASSED QUALITY: This round clear sink has been expertly crafted to strikingly balance beautiful design with lasting performance. Bowl is meticulously finished with flawless precision, and pre-drilled with a perfectly-centered, beveled drain hole.

ULTRA-DURABLE: Made from high-grade, single layer tempered glass, this 1/2" thick glass bowl is especially designed for impact-resistance, and features a stain and scratch-resistant surface to withstand everyday wear and maintain its luster, year after year.

EASY TO INSTALL: Experience hassle-free installation, as bowl comes complete with a standard sized (1-3/4" diameter) drain opening, allowing for the use of any standard, non-overflow type drain. Can be mounted either above-counter or partially recessed into the countertop.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars162 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
